name: NEW ORBIT
blurb: A space game with realistic gravitation, custom ship building and a fully voiced story.

rewards.reward: EPISODE 1\r\n============================== \r\nGet NEW ORBIT Episode 1 for PC/Mac/Linux/Android, all DRM-free! If you already have it you can gift it to a friend!
EPISODE 2\r\n==============================  \r\nGet NEW ORBIT Episode 2 for PC/Mac/Linux/Android as soon as it's done! All DRM-free of course! (includes all previous rewards)

CHALLENGE
============================== 
A bonus pack of exclusive missions for Episode 2!  For Kickstarter-backers only! (All platforms)
+ NEW ORBIT - Deleted Missions with Dev commentary for Episode 1. (PC/Mac only) (includes all previous rewards)

SOUND
============================== 
 Ep1 Soundpack + Ep2 Soundtrack + Exclusive Sound-related in-game Ship Components
(includes all previous rewards)

ART
============================== 
You get the NEW ORBIT Art Book PDF, full of exclusive development insight, Sketches, Screenshots and Notes. 
+ Special in-game Ship Components - extra pretty, so you can spiral downwards in style!
(includes all previous rewards)

BETA + VR
============================== 
Beta Access - Play the game before the final release! 
+ VR Cockpit App (Experience the Shuttle from the inside with your own Oculus Rift)
+ Special mention in the credits 
(includes all previous rewards)

PHYSICAL (Early Bird)
============================== 
A beautifully printed version of the NEW ORBIT Art Book, Stickers, Temporary Tattoos and the Soundtrack on CD! Worldwide shipping is included!
(includes all previous rewards)

PHYSICAL
============================== 
A beautifully printed version of the NEW ORBIT Art Book, Stickers, Temporary Tattoos and the Soundtrack on CD! Worldwide shipping is included!
(includes all previous rewards)

CREATIVE I\r\n============================== \r\nAsteroid Construction Kit - everything you need to build high quality Asteroids for your own project. You get all the pieces, brushes and textures we use to build the many Asteroids for the game plus a tutorial detailing our exact workflow! (Textures + Brushes + 3D elements + Tutorial)

CREATIVE II\r\n============================== \r\nShip Construction Kit - everything you need to build high quality spaceships for your own project. You get all the pieces, brushes and textures we use to build the many ships and components for the game, lots of finished bits and pieces and a tutorial detailing our exact workflow (Textures + Brushes + 3D elements + Tutorial)

DESIGNER
============================== 
Design a ship component or asteroid - send us a sketch or write down your idea and we'll make an Asteroid or component based on that. (We will make it match the broad style of the game and give it proper stats) 
+ Your name in the credits
+ 3D-printed STEEL Orbit Thumb-Ring in your size

CAST I (Digital Rewards Only)
============================== 
Your voice in the game - play a character in NEW ORBIT Episode 2. We’ll coach you over Skype/Facetime. Most likely you’ll be playing an evil thug - you don’t mind, do you? Both male/female with any kind of accent are welcome!
+ Your name in the credits

CAST I
============================== 
Your voice in the game - play a character in NEW ORBIT Episode 2. We’ll coach you over Skype/Facetime. Most likely you’ll be playing an evil thug - you don’t mind, do you? Both male/female with any kind of accent are welcome!
+ Your name in the credits
+ 3D-printed BRONZE STEEL Orbit Thumb-Ring in your size

CAST II
============================== 
Your face in the game - lend your appearance to a character in NEW ORBIT Episode 2. 
+ We’ll send you a printed version of the result!  
+ Your name in the credits
+ 3D-printed BRONZE STEEL Asteroid Thumb Ring in your size

ALPHA
============================== 
Alpha Access - try whatever we’re working on right now - we’ll start releasing rough builds right after the campaign ends!
+ Special Blackish Account (You’ll get all our games plus exclusive prototypes)
+ Your name in the credits as Alpha Supporter
+ 3D-printed PREMIUM SILVER Asteroid Thumb Ring in your size

CAST III - MAJOR ROLE
============================== 
Your voice in the game - play a major role in NEW ORBIT Epsiode 2 - We'll coach you over Skype/Facetime.
+ Your name in the credits
+ The special (one of a kind!) GOLDEN Asteroid Thumb Ring in your size.
SOURCE CODE\r\n============================== \r\nFully reusable Source Code for the Gravitation System and the Base Ship Component System. (C#, Unity) Build your own game!
